content: The case that the last line is exactly limit characters long is not covered by the test cases, but appears in Validator 4.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: This is a fun and challenging clash. Manipulating strings in interesting ways is always nice!

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Very interesting exercice. Yes it seems more difficult than others puzzles but it can be resolved under 5 minutes.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It's a task every programmer should be able to solve. However, the puzzle is a bit more difficult than most of the other Clash of Code puzzles, but that's why I like it. Great idea!
ok because you edited it i will remove my reject and i will upvote

I like it. This is a classical task.
Why not REVERSE and FASTEST? 

I would add a test case with very short words which makes it perfectly clear that if the number of spaces on a line does not divide evenly between words, the empty slots on the left will be assigned more spaces than the slots on the right. IMHO this point is a bit difficult to recognise from your test cases.

17
abc def ghi jkl mno p q r stuv wxy z

abc  def  ghi jkl
mno  p  q  r stuv
wxy z

Thanks for the feedback. I added your test case.
I didn't add the other game modes because honestly I hate writing descriptions and I think a well written tests sequence that delivers the idea makes the best CoC puzzles.
